title: Binary BPE: A Family of Cross-Platform Tokenizers for Binary Analysis
summary: Sequence models for binary analysis are bottlenecked by byte-level tokenization: raw bytes waste precious context window capacity for transformers and other neural network architectures, and many existing text-oriented tokenizers fail on arbitrary 0x00--0xFF sequences.
